Plot: A road movie at sea and a love adventure. The story of two lovers at the world's edge. Shot on location in the North Pacific, the Bering Sea, Alaska and New Orleans. A myth that knows no borders, handmade on 35mm film.
Title: Forget Me Not
Actors: Yannis Stankoglou, Aliki Danezi-Knutsen, Elias Moraitis, Bria Hobgood
